message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to you at $1,500,000. After careful consideration and negotiation, I am pleased to offer you the opportunity to acquire this exceptional item at a special price of $1,200,000. This offer is designed to ensure that both parties benefit from this transaction while respecting the significant value you place on the product. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of conducting this business with you.
